title: stuck at log on
body: it has been many hours, i cant log on. pls help!

replies.body: yes same here since 7 am. Any updates appreciated. Good to know im not the only one, almost repaired.
I'm not seeing any widepsread reports of login issues in NA, but if you could provide more details on what's happening when you try to log in, we can take a look to see what's going on.

How is the other guy's name, who is commenting on this thread, acceptable...?

I've always known that to be a racial slur o.o...

Im paying homage to jiggaboo jones, a youtube personality. Lansd is his slogan. Its not like i have my name as the n word or using jiggaboo in bad taste.

As to my log in issues everything is fine now. But ever since 7am to 5pm yesterday id be stuck at "logging on..." for several seconds and then finally a popup saying connection failure which closes the client.

So as long as it is a racial slur referenced from pop culture and isn't the n word, it loses the connotation of hate speech?

I am not sure that is how it works, but to each there own I guess.
still nothing on this? please help riot!
update: just made an account on euw and am playing just fine! Repair if you dare or maybe its na servers.
